p: The Charit√© algorithm (Berlin, Germany) uses a two-step assay to confirm COVID-19 infection. The first step is a line-screening assay that detects the envelope (E) gene of subgenus Sarbecovirus. The second step is a confirmatory assay, a SARS-CoV-2 specific RT-PCR assay that targets RdRp. Cross-reactivity with alphacoronaviruses and betacoronaviruses was not detected [ 32].
